body.p: Born in Nashville Tennessee on May 31, 1824. Family moved to Paducah in 1836. Sauner first worked as a carpenter. He then was selected to be the Deputy Sheriff of McCracken County. After working for seven years as the Deputy Sheriff, he was elected Sheriff of McCracken County. Became the second Mayor of Paducah, Kentucky, serving from 1859 to 1863. He was reelected in 1861. Sauner died on July 17, 1890 at Paducah, Kentucky.
